ACCESS_ERROR.passwordPolicy:
The password must comply with the following policy:
* At least 8 characters in length
* Contain at least 3 of the following 4 types of characters:
* lower case letters (a-z)
* upper case letters (A-Z)
* numbers (0-9)
* special characters (e.g. !@#$%^&*)
ACCESS_ERROR.passwordPolicyTitle: You must meet at least 3 of the following rules:
